I Am Aman The

I specialize in UI/UX Developement

View My Work

I Specialize In

UI/UX Layouts for Websites & Mobile Applications, having close to perfect responsiveness & ease of use

Concepting

I try to dig in the general Website/Webapp concepts which describes the type of UI/UX joner needed & based on that jonar the particular specific layout pattern needed to please the end-user's corneas

UI/UX

Since a UI/UX engineer's entire work revolves or is centered around building and beautifying the UI/UX only based on the current market scenario, so I try to focus deeply on these like an amateur artist does on his paintings

Visual Design

Since, Designing is currently a separate work-profile and not a web-dev's job unlike previously, but still I try my level best not to keep my attention away from it & try to focus a lot on this aspect too by taking inpirations from other expert level UI/UX designs out there

Interaction

I also try to focus on interacting with common people/internet content consumers on what kind of UI/UX please their eye-sockets

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX Projects are based off a practised tested formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Laying The Blueprint

I try to sketch the initial raw blueprint of the Project in which I try to lay out the raw materials & other things in a Flowchart format , like for example my UI's raw design, raw pattern, etc

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

I try to brainstorm upon the concepts involved in my UI, like the common logics involved for the end-user's interactivity with my UI, other common visual hierarchy changes that needs to occur with the user's activity, managing scalability, etc

3

UI/UX Planning

I try to plan the UI/UX based on the other awesome readymade popular UI's out there in the market,since its not a new big breakthrough now so I take no actions in re-inventing the wheels that's already out there

4

Interaction

I try to consult with a huge set of eyeballs to validate my UI, since interacting/communicating with 'em is a must have skill which I am tring to build, since its a skill which is hyperly needed in this industry
